articles.author: Daniel de Visé
articles.title: 'The least affordable housing market in recent memory': Why now is a great time to rent - USA TODAY
articles.description: Generations of consumers have embraced homeownership as part of the American dream. Lately, though, it looks more like a pipe dream.
articles.content:
Generations of consumers have embraced homeownership as part of the American dream. Lately, though, it looks more like a pipe dream.
